nodes.text: Pho Ph'eahese was the native language of the Pho Ph'eahian species from Pho Ph'eah.
This was a language of squeaks, squeals and high-pitched barks. Its written form uses an intricate set of characters to create a syllabary.
Most Pho Ph'eahian were fluent in both Pho Ph'eahese and Basic, being literate in both languages.
